.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.7.0 (2016-08-17)
++++++++++++++++++

* Fix adding stashes

0.6.0 (2016-08-02)
++++++++++++++++++

* Fix calls to Sensu API entrypoints in order to make them compatible
  with lastest version of Sensu API (0.24) previous versions of Sensu API
  might not behave as expected.

0.1.0 (2015-12-15)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
